statements: SELECT * FROM chat_logs;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM chat_logs WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT sender_id FROM chat_logs WHERE receiver_id = '987e6543-12ab-34cd-56ef-7890fedcba98';
SELECT * FROM chat_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_logs WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM chat_logs WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM chat_logs WHERE receiver_id = '345e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM chat_logs WHERE conversation_id = '567e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_id, COUNT(message_id) AS message_count FROM chat_logs GROUP BY sender_id HAVING message_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM chat_logs WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' AND receiver_id = '345e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM chat_messages WHERE message_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 4;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM chat_messages GROUP BY sender_id ORDER BY message_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 3 AND message_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE participants @> ARRAY['Alice','Bob'];
SELECT conversation_id, start_time, end_time FROM conversations WHERE messages > 10 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM chat_messages GROUP BY sender_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5 ORDER BY message_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE message_id = 1;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY username;
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE participant1_id = 100 OR participant2_id = 200;
SELECT MAX(message_id), MIN(timestamp) FROM chat_messages;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT message_text, COUNT(*) FROM chat_messages GROUP BY message_text HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT conversation_id, start_time, end_time FROM conversations ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, timestamp FROM chat_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp FROM message_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_1, participant_2, start_time FROM conversations WHERE participant_1 = 101 AND participant_2 = 102;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT analysis_result FROM conversation_analysis WHERE analysis_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM conversations JOIN chat_messages ON conversations.participant_1 = chat_messages.sender_id WHERE start_time < '2022-02-01';

SELECT message_text, log_timestamp FROM chat_messages JOIN message_logs ON chat_messages.message_id = message_logs.message_id WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT attachment_url, attachment_type FROM message_attachments WHERE attachment_type = 'image' LIMIT 3;
SELECT participant1_id, participant2_id, start_time, end_time FROM conversations WHERE end_time IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 4 LIMIT 5;
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_score, keywords FROM conversation_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT message_id, attachment_url, attachment_type FROM message_attachments WHERE attachment_type = 'image';
